title: Reconstruction of Schools affected due to the Recent Disaster Situation
decision_details: - Many schools in several areas in the country have been severely affected due to the recent floods and earth slips which occurred in the country and on a proposal made by Hon. Bandula Gunawardena, Minister of Education, the Government has decided to commence reconstruction work immediately. Part of the fund requirement will be met from the Rs.33 billion already allocated for the rehabilitation of properties damaged by floods and earth slips and will be supplemented with the financial provisions provided to the Ministry of Education for the year 2011 and from funds allocated for education activities of Provincial Councils.
